name: Cyber Pink Dwarf
description:
"Cyber Pink Dwarf" is a old school shooter. You play as Boulax, a cyber dwarf who need to repair his space wagon ! But some terribles monsters are trying to destroy it ! Help him to avoid his wagon from explosions !

This game has been developped for the 2020 Global Game Jam by a team of three students :

- Antoine Nisoli : Programmer

- Antoine Cuviliez : Game Art & Game Design

- Pierre Cilluffo : Game Art & Sound Design
